definition: encircling the city (of walls, ring road etc)/around the city
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: The hotel is conveniently located at the junction of Jingyang Road and West Ring Road right in the center of Luyuan District.
sentences.chinese: 酒店地處於綠園區中心的景陽大路與西環城路交匯處。

sentences.english: Simultaneously the citizen's recreational action has spurred the out comers'participation.
sentences.chinese: 市民的環城遊憩活動同時又帶動了外來旅遊者的參與。

sentences.english: That's right. The effect is not going to be isolated inside the Beltway.
sentences.chinese: 是的，影響不僅是在環城高速內部。

sentences.english: Progress is being made in building a new highway around the city.
sentences.chinese: 新環城公路的建設正在向前推進。

sentences.english: It was at Circle City, ere the year was out, that Pete's apprehensions were realized.
sentences.chinese: 年底之前，在環城時，彼得的疑慮被證實了。

sentences.english: My car's engine died at the beltway, can you help me ?
sentences.chinese: 我的車在環城路上死火了，你能幫幫忙嗎？

sentences.english: More belt highways should be constructed so as to relieve the traffic pressure.
sentences.chinese: 爲緩解交通壓力再多修幾條環城公路。

sentences.english: The flying snowflakes have put heavy coats on the trees of the city ring park.
sentences.chinese: 紛紛揚揚的大雪給環城公園的樹木穿上了“棉衣”。
